[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@nextgis/ngw-map](./ngw-map.md) &gt; [NgwMapOptions](./ngw-map.ngwmapoptions.md) &gt; [controls](./ngw-map.ngwmapoptions.controls.md)

## NgwMapOptions.controls property

List of controls that will be initialized when creating a map instance. It can be defined as a string, then points to the corresponding entry in the \[controlAdapters\](webmap-api\#MapAdapter).

 \['ZOOM', 'ATTRIBUTION'\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
controls?: Array<keyof MapControls | C>;
```

## Example


```javascript
{
  controls: [
    'ZOOM',
    new CustomControl()
  ]
}

```
